about_the_game:
Enjoy the thrilling detective investigation "Unsolved Case: Killer Popularity DLC"! Mini-games, puzzles and hidden objects await you! Prove your mettle as a detective by tackling a series of intricate crimes, each designed to challenge your skills and intellect!
This additional content includes four new locations! You'll get to visit the filming room, as well as explore the bowling club's record room, where you're sure to find something that can clear things up for your investigation! There's also a lot waiting for you in your father's private room and lab.

In the additional locations, you can learn new details about the characters and gather more evidence. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

♟️ VISIT THE FILMING ROOM!
Streaming space, pictures on the wall, a broken screen and much more can be found in the filming room. You'll have to look around carefully to find even the slightest clue!

♟️ EXAMINE YOUR FATHER'S PRIVATE ROOM!
Is it possible to make a psychological portrait of a person by the room he lives in? Here you can find a lot of interesting things that will definitely help to shed light on the situation.

♟️ EXPLORE THE BOWLING CLUB'S RECORD ROOM!
Have you ever bowled before? Imagine that you have entered the club's record room and there are racks of pins and bowling balls, certificates on the wall, but as if one is missing... No need to imagine, just go there!

♟️ COME TO THE DRUG LAB!
Get ready, you will have to be very attentive to find among the piles of different microscopes and tubes filled with colorful liquids what you're looking for!
Are you ready to find all the carefully hidden objects and solve all the mysteries? Start your investigation and earn achievements!
